org.springframework.web.socket.adapter.jetty

类 JettyWebSocketHandlerAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.web.socket.adapter.jetty.JettyWebSocketHandlerAdapter

  • @WebSocket
public class JettyWebSocketHandlerAdapter
extends Object
    Adapts WebSocketHandler to the Jetty 9 WebSocket API.
    从以下版本开始:
    4.0
    作者:
    Rossen Stoyanchev
